title: [Pucker Up]
description: Silvery moonlight joins the glow from several wall sconces to fill the room with light.  Several cushions in different colors lay scattered about, atop a plush rug.  An elaborate puzzle box comprised of dozens of colorful woods sits on a a circular white table near a small framed notice.

The light of day shines through an arched leaded glass window, giving the room a warm radiance.  Several cushions in different colors lay scattered about, atop a plush rug.  An elaborate puzzle box comprised of dozens of colorful woods sits on a a circular white table near a small framed notice.
